data.title: Simple Frozen Yogurt
directions: Whisk yogurt, sugar, and salt together in a mixing bowl until sugar has completely dissolved.
Chill in an ice bath or refrigerate until yogurt registers at least 45Â°F on an instant-read thermometer.
Churn yogurt in ice cream machine according to manufacturer's instructions.
Transfer ice cream to airtight container and chill in freezer for at least 4 to 5 hours before serving.
